summary.para: Gets the camera occlusion state associated with the occlusion state report.

param.name: occlusionState
param.para: A DWORD output parameter containing a value from the enumeration.

returns.para: | Error code | Description | |------------|-------------| | S_OK | Succeeded | | E_INVALIDARG | occlusionState is nullptr. |

summary.para: Provides the camera occlusion state associated with a state change detected by an .

remarks.para: An instance of this class is passed into callback. Register the callback interface when you create the camera occlusion state monitor with a call to .
